name: Cold Steel
description: Cold Steel is a fast-paced, isometric shooter that takes place on the moon Europa. Synthetic humans took over the moon and imprisoned our protagonist, Aurora Carson after she was sent to investigate from Earth.  You are armed with a pistol and find weapons lying around the prison to aid your escape. Each cell block is locked off and you need to find the console on each floor before you can progress. Aurora now must shoot her way out of the prison before getting caught.
